snippet.title: The Knightling - Official Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't miss The Knightling release date reveal trailer for the action-adventure platformer developed by Twirlbound. Players will rise to the occasion as a young knight on a quest to find Sir Lionstone. Armed with a powerful shield, traverse the dangerous lands sprinkled with enemies to not only prove your knighthood but save the entire realm in the process. The Knightling is launching on August 28 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#Gaming #TheKnightling #Games
